text:
This is the kind of tweet where 
I KNOW
I shouldn’t read replies.
And then I do.
And then I’m arguing with imbeciles.
And it’s really bad for my blood pressure.
It’s like a debate match between prepared students and poop-flinging howler monkeys.
#COVID19 #vaccine #debate
#masks https://t.co/FSOq0wLpjN
